member.summary: This class contains methods for populating web app features.

member.name: M:Bastille.Id.Web.UI.BastilleIdentityAccountControllerFeatureProvider.PopulateFeature(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApplicationParts.ApplicationPart},Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Controllers.ControllerFeature)
member.summary: Updates the instance.
member.param: The list of instances in the application.
member.remarks: instances in appear in the same ordered sequence they are stored in . This ordering may be used by the feature provider to make precedence decisions.
